name: Savinirs Infotech
tag_list: product-lifecycle-management, active-rfid, erp, scm, sysdna, hms, mis
overview: We are a Bangalore based Embedded Systems Company providing solutions in the wireless communication and Active RFID Domain. We have indigenously developed RFID solutions and related supporting software solutions. Client Problems can be diverse like tracking of mobile & stationary assets, Baggage handling in airports, product tracking in b2b supply chain, automated parking system, traffic management in public transport system, temperature & pressure sensing. For asset tracking and other key problems defined above, we provide Active RFID products for the short range solution and with GPRS/GSM Modules integrated for long range covers. Provide customized web applications for the Data Management and MIS. At Savinirs innovation and invention is the core mantra. We have a dedicated R&D team in the embedded systems. Here our scientists are developing various algorithms and solutions that shall define the future technologies. We enable our clients to thrive in the rapidly changing business environment by delivering end-to-end solutions in Product Life Cycle Management (Windchill and ARAS implementation and support) and Enterprise Resource Planning Solutions for SME through our SysDNA ERP Application.
